DOC.brief_title: A Trial Comparing Effect Pravastatin Rosuvastatin Atherosclerosis Progression Measured Carotid Intima Media Thickness Patients With Coronary Artery Disease After Biolimus Eluting Stent ( Nobori® ) Implantation : CPR IMT
